title: Better to Marry Renewables than Burn Fossil Fuels with Passion
description: Arianna Krinos and I were invited to present on our winning submission to the 2018 Mathematical Contest in Modeling. We enjoyed being in Denver and meeting Ben Fusaro, the founder of the MCM.

title: Parameter and Uncertainty Estimation for a Model of Atmospheric CO2 Observations
description: Arianna Krinos and I gave a talk on our atmospheric CO2 modeling work as part of the Department of Mathematics' annual Layman Undergraduate Research Competition. We had a fun time presenting together and won first place!
